title: "Machine Learning Supports Automated Digital Image Scoring of Stool Consistency in Diapers"
excerpt: "The categorization of non–toilet-trained children’s stool consistency remains difficult. The purpose of this study was to see if it was possible to use machine learning to automate the categorization of stool consistencies from diaper pictures (ML)."
